nodes.text: Qiraash was a location from which the Qiraash builder of the Wheel space station, Doffen Gaitag, originated.

Qiraash was first mentioned in Viva Space Vegas! The History of the Marvelous Wheel, an article written by Abel G. Peña and Rich Handley and published on the StarWars.com blog in 2013. The article does not make clear what, if any, the connection between the location Qiraash and the species of the same name is and also does not give context to what sort of location Qiraash is.
